title: Update admin access-denied messaging for multiple allowlisted admins

requirements.summary: Adjust AdminGuard access-denied copy to reference multiple allowlisted administrators while continuing to block non-admin access to the admin competition creation page based on backend admin status.
acceptanceCriteria: When a non-admin visits the admin create competition route, the page shows an access-denied message in English indicating the page is restricted to allowlisted administrators.
When an allowlisted admin visits the admin create competition route, the create competition form renders as before.

file_operations.description: Update the access-denied messaging to refer to 'allowlisted administrators' (plural) rather than a single administrator, while keeping the existing authorization check based on the backend-reported admin status (via useIsCallerAdmin/actor.isCallerAdmin). Use the existing authorization component patterns already present in the app; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
